content: Is Aurelius like Home Capital Group, a Canadian financial company whose management has been accused of dishonesty by short sellers?

author: GothamResearch
content: Shares of Home Capital Group declined -65% yesterday. The shares trade at a steep discount relative to book value and relative to its peers.

author: GothamResearch
content: Unlike Home Capital Group, Aurelius’ shares trade at a premium to NAV, a large premium to book value, & a very large premium vs its peers.

author: GothamResearch
content: Aurelius' share price does not seem to reflect any “dishonesty discount” unlike Home Capital Group's share price. We would understand this

author: GothamResearch
content: if Aurelius & its CEO were exemplary in their corporate governance, disclosures, & integrity; That doesn’t seem to be the case, in our view.
